option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: added required libs for proper functionality

MESSAGE.value: Added PostingFileUtils that saves a document meta data
Added main functins of reader/parser as first executor job
Added deserialization with random access file of term data
Added ability to run indexer with only 3 parameters (docsDir, stopWordsFile, useStemmer)
Added some gui to the story
added required libs for proper functionality
